title: I’m Outfitting My Apartment With These Prime Day 2.0 Deals
description: Can’t-miss sales on essentials for every room.
byline: Meg Donohue, Elly Leavitt, Sarah Maberry
excerpt: Here are 26 of the best Amazon Prime Day furniture deals to shop during Prime Big Deal Days, with discounts of up to 76 percent off.
text: Nathan James Cohen Mid-Century Modern Bar StoolWoven faux leather upholstery and a solid wood frame lend a mid-century modern feel to this pretty Nathan James bar stool. On sale for under $200, it’s an easy kitchen upgrade that can make a major impact. Customer review: “Amazing quality! They were easy to assemble by myself, comfortable, and very durable.”Little Tree 47-Inch Round Wooden Dining TableContrasting grain lines add an eye-catching twist to this classic wood dining table. At 47 inches wide, it’s a great pick for small kitchens. Customer review: “Having this table gives life to my home.”Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowMartha Stewart Taytum Swivel Task ChairElevate your home office with this sleek task chair, featuring elegant channel tufting and a polished brass frame.Customer review: “It took me 15 minutes to put together and looks great, super comfy and stylish. So glad I bought it!’Safavieh Set of 2 Parker Parkse Side ChairsPick up a few of these versatile farmhouse-style chairs for all your holiday gatherings this season. Offered in a range of chic colors, there’s a cute spindle-back design to suit any existing setup. Customer review: “If you are looking for the perfect chairs to go with your farmhouse table, these are it. They were super easy to put together—it took us maybe 30 minutes for us to assemble all six.”Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowPoly & Bark Essex 89” Leather SofaIf you’re looking for a gorgeous leather couch on Amazon, Poly & Bark is the brand to shop. Upholstered in genuine leather, this mid-century modern style will beautifully patina over time. Customer review: “This sofa is absolute quality. At first, I was nervous about buying a leather sofa on Amazon, but as soon as I received it, I knew the quality was there. My whole family agrees that this sofa is absolutely comfortable.”Walker Edison Andre Solid Wood Dining TableHundreds of five-star reviewers agree that this Walker Edison dining table offers exceptional quality for the price. Made from solid pine wood, the minimalist design can easily blend with almost any decor style. Customer review: “So impressed with the quality of this table for the price! It took about 45 minutes to put together, and I am so happy with how it looks. It’s very sturdy and solid wood on the top.”Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowNathan James Theo Industrial Bookshelf with DrawersMake the most of your wall space with this tiered, mixed-media bookcase. Its four shelves are perfect for displaying small decor, while its two drawers can easily hide any clutter.Customer review: “The drawers offer surprisingly spacious storage, all while being compact and very stylish. I have received many compliments on this piece as a backdrop for my WFH office, but could definitely see this as a great addition anywhere in my home. Five stars all around and good quality for the price.”GreenForest Folding Desk See here: the perfect workspace solution for crowded offices or cramped apartments. You can fold it right up when you’re done using it, so it doesn’t eat up all your square footage. Customer review: “I’m absolutely thrilled with this small folding computer desk–it’s truly a game-changer for my workspace! The compact design is perfect for my limited space, and the folding feature adds a level of versatility that I didn’t know I needed.”Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowKin By Tuft & Needle 10-Inch MattressChronic pain sufferers might be interested in this ultra-supportive yet cooling mattress from Tuft & Needle.Customer review: “I wish to hug the makers of this INCREDIBLE mattress!!! My back is an issue and finding the right mattress has been a challenge over the years. With this Tuft & Needle mattress, my problem back not only felt good but also as if I’m on the right track to healing. Rivals the best hotel experience. I can’t believe this is my everyday bed. I honestly feel lucky!”Best Choice Products 8-Cube Storage OrganizerThese bins are great to use as drawers, for holding clothes, pantry products, or other odds and ends. Without the baskets, it’s the perfect bookcase or display shelf. Customer review: “Just what I needed! Perfect size, quality is good too. Didn’t take me too long to put it together, and I did it alone. Looks great!”Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowPhi Villa Farmhouse Side Table SetIt’s hard to imagine a home these wouldn’t look lovely in. (Plus, there’s a matching coffee table if you’re interested.)Customer review: “These end tables were exactly what I was looking for! I love having matching tables on each end of the sofa. Great price and easy to build. It only took an hour to assemble both.”Nectar Gel Memory Foam MattressNectar mattresses are known for being some of Amazon’s best, so grab this gel memory foam option while it’s over $300 off. Customer review: “This is one of the more comfortable mattresses I’ve had. I sleep wonderfully and am always excited to come home after a vacation to this bed. As long as you are okay with a softer mattress, this is a great choice!”Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowFinnhomy Rattan Cabinet Rattan is a great design element that adds a bit of style to otherwise ordinary furniture essentials.Customer review: “It was easy to assemble, looks great, and had a lot of storage space inside. Very happy with this purchase.”OKD Fluted Coffee Table We’re obsessed with the cut-out shelf in the middle of this oblong coffee table, as well as its gorgeous fluted finish.Customer review: “This table is worth the price! It took a little while to build, but it is nice and sturdy and very high quality. You can fit a lot in the drawer and on the shelf.”Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowGuyii Dining Table Set The gorgeous look of this table is enough to persuade us to purchase, but the rave reviews about Guyii’s customer service is what really puts this over the top.Customer review: “First of all, the quality is incredible, it’s very easy to assemble, and the service support did a great job communicating with me. Thanks again for being that efficient, nice, and keeping me updated on my shipment!”Best Choice Products Wicker Egg Chair Here is the perfect comfortable outdoor chair to kick back in and sip on some coffee or mulled wine.Customer review: “I love this chair, my dog loves this chair, my neighbors love this chair. It looks beautiful and has a sturdy structure.”Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowFlamaker Wicker Outdoor Furniture SetThis affordable set can hold its own against any of our favorite luxury outdoor furniture brands. Customer review: “These look great! I thought they were very easy to put together, and the quality seems great. The chairs are wide and seem very durable. I love the look, and it’s so worth the price.”BAYKA Wall Mounted Floating Shelves Make use of that vertical space, people! Customer review: “These shelves are perfect. Well made and easy to install. Would definitely buy again if needed in the future. Would recommend.”Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowBEAUTYPEAK Arch Floor Mirror Everyone knows that mirrors are hard to shop for; they’re often expensive and can arrive shattered, which makes returns even more challenging. In our experience, Amazon is one of the best places to browse and buy.Customer review: “This mirror exceeded my expectations by miles! I will say for a mirror it isn’t horrible pricing. I would suggest getting it on sale or on prime day because that is when I got it for the cheapest price. Definitely worth your money.”VASAGLE Coat Rack Stop balancing on one leg while trying to get your shoes on. It’s a bad fall waiting to happen.Customer review: “I love that everything is off the floor! It comes with enough hooks for all our stuff as well as plenty of shoe space! Everything you need to build it comes with it, which was awesome. Very sturdy. Great for the money.”Meg (she/her) is the associate fashion commerce editor at ELLE.com, where she specializes in shopping stories spanning the fashion, home, and lifestyle categories. Over the past three years, she has devoted countless hours to researching brands, testing hundreds (maybe even thousands!) of products, and deep-diving into market and consumer trends. Her favorite job responsibilities consist of co-writing the monthly series Same Same But Different and curating the fashion market for ELLE Escapes. Meg graduated magna cum laude from the Missouri School of Journalism with an emphasis on magazine editing. In 2020, one of her feature stories in the service article category was recognized by the Association for Education in Journalism and Mass Communication. The year prior, the Society of Professional Journalists named voxmagazine.com “Best Affiliated Magazine” in its Mark of Excellence Awards, when she was on staff. Meg’s stories have appeared on Cosmopolitan, Town & Country, Harper’s Bazaar, and Good Housekeeping, among many other outlets. Her personal passions include travel, buffalo sauce, and gardening. You can find her in New York, where she lives, or on Instagram, where she also lives. She will never stop hoping for a One Direction reunion tour. Elly Leavitt is a fashion and luxury commerce editor at Hearst covering fashion, design, and more across multiple brands. You can probably find her in line at Trader Joe's. You will never find her at SoulCycle.Sarah Maberry is a commerce writer for Hearst Magazines, where she covers fashion, beauty and pop culture. A seasoned trend forecaster and fashion historian, she analyzes viral products and trends on a deeper level. When she’s not writing for Cosmopolitan, ELLE, Harper’s BAZAAR, House Beautiful, Town & Country, Delish and other publications, she can be found roaming the Museum at FIT (her alma matter) or sewing her own couture while she binge-watches reality TV.
html:
Nathan James Cohen Mid-Century Modern Bar Stool

Woven faux leather upholstery and a solid wood frame lend a mid-century modern feel to this pretty Nathan James bar stool. On sale for under $200, it’s an easy kitchen upgrade that can make a major impact.

Customer review: “Amazing quality! They were easy to assemble by myself, comfortable, and very durable.”

Little Tree 47-Inch Round Wooden Dining Table

Contrasting grain lines add an eye-catching twist to this classic wood dining table. At 47 inches wide, it’s a great pick for small kitchens.

Customer review: “Having this table gives life to my home.”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Martha Stewart Taytum Swivel Task Chair

Elevate your home office with this sleek task chair, featuring elegant channel tufting and a polished brass frame.

Customer review: “It took me 15 minutes to put together and looks great, super comfy and stylish. So glad I bought it!’

Safavieh Set of 2 Parker Parkse Side Chairs

Pick up a few of these versatile farmhouse-style chairs for all your holiday gatherings this season. Offered in a range of chic colors, there’s a cute spindle-back design to suit any existing setup.

Customer review: “If you are looking for the perfect chairs to go with your farmhouse table, these are it. They were super easy to put together—it took us maybe 30 minutes for us to assemble all six.”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Poly & Bark Essex 89” Leather Sofa

If you’re looking for a gorgeous leather couch on Amazon, Poly & Bark is the brand to shop. Upholstered in genuine leather, this mid-century modern style will beautifully patina over time.

Customer review: “This sofa is absolute quality. At first, I was nervous about buying a leather sofa on Amazon, but as soon as I received it, I knew the quality was there. My whole family agrees that this sofa is absolutely comfortable.”

Walker Edison Andre Solid Wood Dining Table

Hundreds of five-star reviewers agree that this Walker Edison dining table offers exceptional quality for the price. Made from solid pine wood, the minimalist design can easily blend with almost any decor style.

Customer review: “So impressed with the quality of this table for the price! It took about 45 minutes to put together, and I am so happy with how it looks. It’s very sturdy and solid wood on the top.”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Nathan James Theo Industrial Bookshelf with Drawers

Make the most of your wall space with this tiered, mixed-media bookcase. Its four shelves are perfect for displaying small decor, while its two drawers can easily hide any clutter.

Customer review: “The drawers offer surprisingly spacious storage, all while being compact and very stylish. I have received many compliments on this piece as a backdrop for my WFH office, but could definitely see this as a great addition anywhere in my home. Five stars all around and good quality for the price.”

GreenForest Folding Desk

See here: the perfect workspace solution for crowded offices or cramped apartments. You can fold it right up when you’re done using it, so it doesn’t eat up all your square footage.

Customer review: “I’m absolutely thrilled with this small folding computer desk–it’s truly a game-changer for my workspace! The compact design is perfect for my limited space, and the folding feature adds a level of versatility that I didn’t know I needed.”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Kin By Tuft & Needle 10-Inch Mattress

Chronic pain sufferers might be interested in this ultra-supportive yet cooling mattress from Tuft & Needle.

Customer review: “I wish to hug the makers of this INCREDIBLE mattress!!! My back is an issue and finding the right mattress has been a challenge over the years. With this Tuft & Needle mattress, my problem back not only felt good but also as if I’m on the right track to healing. Rivals the best hotel experience. I can’t believe this is my everyday bed. I honestly feel lucky!”

Best Choice Products 8-Cube Storage Organizer

These bins are great to use as drawers, for holding clothes, pantry products, or other odds and ends. Without the baskets, it’s the perfect bookcase or display shelf.

Customer review: “Just what I needed! Perfect size, quality is good too. Didn’t take me too long to put it together, and I did it alone. Looks great!”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Phi Villa Farmhouse Side Table Set

It’s hard to imagine a home these wouldn’t look lovely in. (Plus, there’s a matching coffee table if you’re interested.)

Customer review: “These end tables were exactly what I was looking for! I love having matching tables on each end of the sofa. Great price and easy to build. It only took an hour to assemble both.”

Nectar Gel Memory Foam Mattress

Nectar mattresses are known for being some of Amazon’s best, so grab this gel memory foam option while it’s over $300 off.

Customer review: “This is one of the more comfortable mattresses I’ve had. I sleep wonderfully and am always excited to come home after a vacation to this bed. As long as you are okay with a softer mattress, this is a great choice!”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Finnhomy Rattan Cabinet

Rattan is a great design element that adds a bit of style to otherwise ordinary furniture essentials.

Customer review: “It was easy to assemble, looks great, and had a lot of storage space inside. Very happy with this purchase.”

OKD Fluted Coffee Table

We’re obsessed with the cut-out shelf in the middle of this oblong coffee table, as well as its gorgeous fluted finish.

Customer review: “This table is worth the price! It took a little while to build, but it is nice and sturdy and very high quality. You can fit a lot in the drawer and on the shelf.”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Guyii Dining Table Set

The gorgeous look of this table is enough to persuade us to purchase, but the rave reviews about Guyii’s customer service is what really puts this over the top.

Customer review: “First of all, the quality is incredible, it’s very easy to assemble, and the service support did a great job communicating with me. Thanks again for being that efficient, nice, and keeping me updated on my shipment!”

Best Choice Products Wicker Egg Chair

Here is the perfect comfortable outdoor chair to kick back in and sip on some coffee or mulled wine.

Customer review: “I love this chair, my dog loves this chair, my neighbors love this chair. It looks beautiful and has a sturdy structure.”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Flamaker Wicker Outdoor Furniture Set

This affordable set can hold its own against any of our favorite luxury outdoor furniture brands.

Customer review: “These look great! I thought they were very easy to put together, and the quality seems great. The chairs are wide and seem very durable. I love the look, and it’s so worth the price.”

BAYKA Wall Mounted Floating Shelves

Make use of that vertical space, people!

Customer review: “These shelves are perfect. Well made and easy to install. Would definitely buy again if needed in the future. Would recommend.”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

BEAUTYPEAK Arch Floor Mirror

Everyone knows that mirrors are hard to shop for; they’re often expensive and can arrive shattered, which makes returns even more challenging. In our experience, Amazon is one of the best places to browse and buy.

Customer review: “This mirror exceeded my expectations by miles! I will say for a mirror it isn’t horrible pricing. I would suggest getting it on sale or on prime day because that is when I got it for the cheapest price. Definitely worth your money.”

VASAGLE Coat Rack

Stop balancing on one leg while trying to get your shoes on. It’s a bad fall waiting to happen.

Customer review: “I love that everything is off the floor! It comes with enough hooks for all our stuff as well as plenty of shoe space! Everything you need to build it comes with it, which was awesome. Very sturdy. Great for the money.”

Meg (she/her) is the associate fashion commerce editor at ELLE.com, where she specializes in shopping stories spanning the fashion, home, and lifestyle categories. Over the past three years, she has devoted countless hours to researching brands, testing hundreds (maybe even thousands!) of products, and deep-diving into market and consumer trends. Her favorite job responsibilities consist of co-writing the monthly series Same Same But Different and curating the fashion market for ELLE Escapes. Meg graduated magna cum laude from the Missouri School of Journalism with an emphasis on magazine editing. In 2020, one of her feature stories in the service article category was recognized by the Association for Education in Journalism and Mass Communication. The year prior, the Society of Professional Journalists named voxmagazine.com “Best Affiliated Magazine” in its Mark of Excellence Awards, when she was on staff. Meg’s stories have appeared on Cosmopolitan, Town & Country, Harper’s Bazaar, and Good Housekeeping, among many other outlets. Her personal passions include travel, buffalo sauce, and gardening. You can find her in New York, where she lives, or on Instagram, where she also lives. She will never stop hoping for a One Direction reunion tour. 

Elly Leavitt is a fashion and luxury commerce editor at Hearst covering fashion, design, and more across multiple brands. You can probably find her in line at Trader Joe's. You will never find her at SoulCycle.

Sarah Maberry is a commerce writer for Hearst Magazines, where she covers fashion, beauty and pop culture. A seasoned trend forecaster and fashion historian, she analyzes viral products and trends on a deeper level. When she’s not writing for Cosmopolitan, ELLE, Harper’s BAZAAR, House Beautiful, Town & Country, Delish and other publications, she can be found roaming the Museum at FIT (her alma matter) or sewing her own couture while she binge-watches reality TV.
